casebody.data:
STATE OF MONTANA, Plaintiff, vs. KIM ALLYN THEIREL, Defendant.

DECISION

No. 10010 DATED this 18th day of March, 1977.

The application of the above-named defendant for a review of the sentence of Ten (10) years imposed on November 1, 1976, was fully heard and after a careful consideration of the entire matter it is decided that:

The sentence be and remain as originally imposed.

We wish to thank James Johnson, Attorney at Law, Missoula, Montana for his assistance to the defendant and this Court.

SENTENCE REVIEW DIVISION

Jack D. Shanstrom, Chairman; Robert C. Sykes.
